to be recognise for their hard work as they are the only soles whom taking people around despite the living and dying situation f there can be any help towards them too would be greatly appreciated.
abrupting and also how are they suppose to work through this difficult times to support themselves and their families. This is the situation where many are going to take advantage of it because they are pretenting to be working or doing something, when they are just waste of breath. Thanks
attributes.background: Take a glance at these worried times and general public who are anxious about the whole situation and cannot take a stand, my main aim is towards self employed taxi drivers, who are putting their own health on the line to deliver a service.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced support for self-employed individuals: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/chancellor-gives-support-to-millions-of-self-employed-individuals

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
